name: Infected Ones - Chapter One: Left For Death
name_original: Infected Ones - Chapter One: Left For Death
description:
Infected Ones - Chapter One: Left For Death

There are two "Infected Ones" games! Once you finish this game, continue in "Infected Ones - Chapter Two: Rescue" to proceed with the story.

||| IMPORTANT!!! |||

- Depending on your device, the game and some layouts within it may take time to load. Be patient, if it doesn't load even after a long time, please refresh this page. If the game won't load even after refreshing the page several times, try closing any other open tabs on your browser and refresh the page again.

- If you want to play in full screen, there is a small button in the lower right corner of the game screen, click on it.
